season complet buffalo bill american footbal franchise. list document season-by-season record bills' franchis 1960 present, includ postseason records, leagu award individu player head coaches. bill finish recent season (2015) record eight win eight losses. complet team history, see histori buffalo bill content 1 season 1.1 all-tim record 2 footnot 3 refer 4 extern link seasons[edit] finish, wins, losses, tie column list regular season result exclud postseason play. regular postseason record combin bottom list. afl champion (1960–1969) super bowl champion (1970–present) confer champion divis champion wild card berth one-gam playoff berth season team leagu confer divis regular season post season result award head coach finish win loss tie 1960 1960 afl eastern 3rd 5 8 1 buster ramsey 1961 1961 afl eastern 4th 6 8 0 buster ramsey 1962 1962 afl eastern 3rd 7 6 1 lou saban 1963 1963 afl eastern 2nd 7 6 1 lost division playoff (patriots) 8–26 lou saban 1964 1964 afl eastern 1st 12 2 0 afl championship (1) (chargers) 20–7 lou saban (coy) lou saban 1965 1965 afl eastern 1st 10 3 1 afl championship (2) (at chargers) 23–0 lou saban (coy) lou saban 1966 1966 afl eastern 1st 9 4 1 lost afl championship (chiefs) 7–31 bobbi burnett (roy) joe collier 1967 1967 afl eastern 3rd 4 10 0 joe collier 1968 1968 afl eastern 5th 1 12 1 joe collier (0–2) harvey johnson (1–10–1) 1969 1969 afl eastern 4th 4 10 0 john rauch 1970 1970 nfl afc east 4th 3 10 1 denni shaw (oroy)(roy) john rauch 1971 1971 nfl afc east 5th 1 13 0 harvey johnson 1972 1972 nfl afc east 4th 4 9 1 lou saban 1973 1973 nfl afc east 2nd 9 5 0 o.j. simpson (mvp)(opoy) lou saban 1974 1974 nfl afc east 2nd 9 5 0 lost division playoff (at steelers) 14–32 lou saban 1975 1975 nfl afc east 3rd 8 6 0 lou saban 1976 1976 nfl afc east 5th 2 12 0 lou saban (2–3) jim ringo (0–9) 1977 1977 nfl afc east 5th 3 11 0 jim ringo 1978 1978 nfl afc east 4th 5 11 0 chuck knox 1979 1979 nfl afc east 4th 7 9 0 jim haslett (droy), jerri butler (roy) chuck knox 1980 1980 nfl afc east 1st 11 5 0 lost division playoff (at chargers) 14–20 joe cribb (roy), chuck knox (coy) chuck knox 1981 1981 nfl afc east 3rd 10 6 0 wild card playoff (at jets) 31–27 lost division playoff (at bengals) 21–28 chuck knox 1982[1] 1982 nfl afc — 9th 4 5 0 chuck knox 1983 1983 nfl afc east 3rd 8 8 0 kay stephenson 1984 1984 nfl afc east 5th 2 14 0 kay stephenson 1985 1985 nfl afc east 5th 2 14 0 kay stephenson (0–4) hank bullough (2–10) 1986 1986 nfl afc east 4th 4 12 0 hank bullough (2–7) marv levi (2–5) 1987 1987 nfl afc east 4th 7 8 0 shane conlan (droy)(roy) marv levi 1988 1988 nfl afc east 1st 12 4 0 division playoff (oilers) 17–10 lost confer championship (at bengals) 10–21 marv levi (coy) marv levi 1989 1989 nfl afc east 1st 9 7 0 lost division playoff (at browns) 30–34 marv levi 1990 1990 nfl afc east 1st 13 3 0 division playoff (dolphins) 44–34 confer championship (raiders) 51–3 lost super bowl xxv (vs. giants) 19–20 bruce smith (dpoy) marv levi 1991 1991 nfl afc east 1st 13 3 0 division playoff (chiefs) 37–14 confer championship (broncos) 10–7 lost super bowl xxvi (vs. redskins) 24–37 thurman thoma (mvp)(opoy) marv levi 1992 1992 nfl afc east 2nd 11 5 0 wild card playoff (oilers) 41–38 (ot)[2] division playoff (at steelers) 24–3 confer championship (at dolphins) 29–10 lost super bowl xxvii (vs. cowboys) 17–52 marv levi 1993 1993 nfl afc east 1st 12 4 0 division playoff (raiders) 29–23 confer championship (chiefs) 30–13 lost super bowl xxviii (vs. cowboys) 13–30 marv levi (coy) marv levi 1994 1994 nfl afc east 4th 7 9 0 marv levi 1995 1995 nfl afc east 1st 10 6 0 wild card playoff (dolphins) 37–22 lost division playoff (at steelers) 21–40 bryce paup (dpy) marv levi 1996 1996 nfl afc east 2nd 10 6 0 lost wild card playoff (jaguars) 27–30 bruce smith (dpy) marv levi 1997 1997 nfl afc east 4th 6 10 0 marv levi 1998 1998 nfl afc east 3rd 10 6 0 lost wild card playoff (at dolphins) 17–24 wade phillip 1999 1999 nfl afc east 2nd 11 5 0 lost wild card playoff (at titans) 16–22[3] wade phillip 2000 2000 nfl afc east 4th 8 8 0 wade phillip 2001 2001 nfl afc east 5th 3 13 0 gregg william 2002 2002 nfl afc east 4th 8 8 0 gregg william 2003 2003 nfl afc east 3rd 6 10 0 gregg william 2004 2004 nfl afc east 3rd 9 7 0 mike mularkey 2005 2005 nfl afc east 3rd 5 11 0 mike mularkey 2006 2006 nfl afc east 3rd 7 9 0 dick jauron 2007 2007 nfl afc east 2nd 7 9 0 dick jauron 2008 2008 nfl afc east 4th 7 9 0 dick jauron 2009 2009 nfl afc east 4th 6 10 0 dick jauron (3–7) perri fewel (3–4) 2010 2010 nfl afc
